Class RotatableDrawableCV

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback

    public class RotatableDrawableCV
extends android.graphics.drawable.LayerDrawable
    Class for Drawable objects that can be rotated

      • getCorners

        public android.graphics.Point[] getCorners()
        Get the four corners of the embedded Drawable or View object (i.e. of its enclosing rectangle), taking into account the rotation.
        Returns:
        Array with exactly four elements of class Point, specifying the four corners (in clockwise order, starting with the left top corner)

      • rotateAroundCenter

        public android.graphics.Point rotateAroundCenter(android.graphics.Point p,
                                                 boolean inAngleDirection)
        Auxiliary method to rotate a Point around the center of the drawable object by the rotationAngle
        Parameters:
        p - The point to rotate
        inAngleDirection - If set to false, the rotation will be by the amount of the rotationAngle but in the opposite direction
